name: Roll back the time
description:
Rollback is a game made for the Ludum Dare Game Jam.

Theme: Stuck in a loop.

Rollback is a game about speed. You have a time limit to collect 5 keys, some are guarded by a maze, others are puzzles. If you fail to get all 5 keys, time gets rolled back, but if you succeed, you escape the time loop.

I'll try to get the webgl version working for the people who don't like to download, but for now its not working.
